page.title: 10TRADE-THREE SHOPS
page.content: A CHEMIST SELLS MEDICINES AND PILLS WHICH KEEP AND MAKE YOU WELL.MOST PHARMISISTS MAKE THEIR OWN MEDICINES AT THE SHOP.SOME CHEMISTS SELL SHAMPOO AND SWEETS.THE DOCTORS WRITE IN LATIN SO THAT ONLY THE PHARMISISTS CAN READ IT. NEWSAGENTS SELL COMICS,MAGAZINES AND NEWSPAPERS.A LOT OF NEWSAGENTS ALSO SELL SWEETS,DRINKS,STICKERS AND SOME SELL VIDEO TAPES.MOST NEWSAGENTS ARE OPEN ON A SUNDAY AND A FEW ARE OPEN ON CHRISTMAS DAY,THOSE ARE USUALLY SMALL SHOPS.YOU CAN ORDER YOUR NEWSPAPERS FROM A NEWSAGENTS NEAR YOU,AND IT CAN ALSO BE DELIVERED. A BICYCLE SHOP SELLS ALL DIFFERANT BIKES.IT'S GOT BMX'S,RACERS,TRYCYCLES AND OTHER BIKES.IF YOU BREAK THEM YOU CAN GET THEM FIXED.THEY ALSO SELL SPARES E.G.BRAKE CABLES,INNER TUBES AND PUNCTURE REPAIR KITS.
